extendedInfo.description: AppAlarm is now FREE and OPEN SOURCE!Wake up to Pandora, Slacker Radio, Stitcher or StreamFurious Pro!Launch any app or shortcut as an alarm clock!Features-Multiple alarms-Pick any app-Create shortcuts or pick them from the home screen-Launch custom âAnyCutâ style intents-Play backup alarm while launching app-Choose a specific Pandora Station-Experimental support for Google Listen-Force close the app when the alarm is done-Backup and Restore your alarm settings to you SD card-Everything in the LITE version-Repeating alarms-Launch even if on call-Network test and option to play backup if the test fails-Turn wi-fi on/off-Wifi timeout options-Custom timeouts-Set media volumeWarning: As of Android 2.2, AppAlarm no longer has the ability to kill other apps. A workaround (to make sure the music starts when AppAlarm does) is to always quit Pandora or Slacker (or whichever music app you launch with AppAlarm) when you're finished with it. AppAlarm still should work normally on Android 2.1 and below.

reviews.title: Best alarm app out there
reviews.comment: The fact that it can use pandora channels as alarms is amazingly awsome! I use it every day for my alram clock love the app keep up the. Good work
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Turn your Android into a cool clock radio.
reviews.comment: Turned my HTC Rezound into an awesome clock radio, also works great with iHeartRadio and TuneIn, both of which offer  a \"play at startup\" option as well.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Didn\'t work
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t open Pandora and the backup alarm didn\'t go off either. Also every time you open the app it goes to the edit alarm screen and starts making another alarm, which you have to exit out of and delete to even try testing the regular alarm again.
reviews.author: James Bentley

reviews.title: Perfect!
reviews.comment: Exactly what I wanted! The other apps I looked at would only launch Pandora, not actually play it so I\'m glad this app figured out a way to fix that (close the app and relaunch it)!
reviews.author: Arley Wolfand

reviews.comment: This is the most almost perfect alarm app available. I love the flexibility. Would like to be able to set date for future date though, not just day
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent except Internet Detection
reviews.comment: This is a great app but I find that the internet detection isn\'t working for me. It may because I\'m using an old phone that no longer has telcom provider access and only has WiFi access. But AppAlarm decides to play the alarm sound because it can\'t find the internet and if I then go to the phone and start IHeartRadio manually it is able to find the internet
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app does everything I want except...
reviews.comment: When using the app to launch Tune In Radio it leaves the screen on and therefore runs the battery down.  Would be great if the screen didn\'t turn on at all.
reviews.author: David Finch

reviews.title: Works beautifully
reviews.comment: This is exactly what I was looking for in an alarm app.  All I really wanted was to wake up to Pandora every morning and this does that really well.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good stuff
reviews.comment: Exactly what I was looking for.  I haven\'t been able to pinpoint why the Media volume settings like to randomly go to zero, but this app gets around it by forcing the volume to whatever you specify.  I figured I was out of luck in regards to an app launching alarm, but this works great.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: awesome
reviews.comment: it works pretty well.  wish it had a gradual wake feature where the media volume is increased slowly over a period of time.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pandora Alarms Work Again
reviews.comment: This used to be a great App until a change in Android broke it\'s ability to wake you up to any of your Pandora stations.  Finally it\'s fixed and works again.  Just as great as ever
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Musical Alarm
reviews.comment: If you like to wake up to music, this is the perfect alarm app. Unfortunately it doesn\'t work with the newer version of Google Music (because Google broke playlist functionality) but it still works perfectly with Pandora and it\'s not too difficult to find older versions of Google Music. It\'s very straightforward and works quite well.
reviews.author: Altay Hunter

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Wow, this is awesome it really works. The fact that it tests your wifi (if you want it to) before it launches is great and if connection fails, there\'s no problem it has a backup alarm.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No longer works
reviews.comment: Used to love it, but no longer works with Pandora since JB update. It opens Pandora but won\'t get past the opening ad to play actual music and never plays a backup alarm. I\'ve been late to work thanks to its unreliability. No reason to use this app anymore. Very frustrating that I actually paid for this back in the day and get zero support now.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: does what it says
reviews.comment: Good program and it\'s free. A few bells a whistles missing is the only reason it\'s a 4. Otherwise highly recommended.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work anymore
reviews.comment: It used to work perfectly. Now for some reason all it does is open Pandora. It doesn\'t launch any stations. I even uninstalled and reinstalled the program hoping that would fix it. Running it under Thundershed 1.5
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great App!!!!!
reviews.comment: Not complicated like others...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: Perfect if you want to wake up to your Pandora!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Still works...
reviews.comment: Works fine.  All you have to do is uncheck \"Force App Restart On Launch\"  and make sure Pandora is closed.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Alarm will occasionally flag a combatibility issue with froyo on droid 2
reviews.author: A Google User
